old.org.bouncycastle.jce.netscape

Class NetscapeCertRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • old.org.bouncycastle.asn1.ASN1Encodable
      • old.org.bouncycastle.jce.netscape.NetscapeCertRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DEREncodable

    public class NetscapeCertRequest
extends ASN1Encodable
    Handles NetScape certificate request (KEYGEN), these are constructed as: 
    
   SignedPublicKeyAndChallenge ::= SEQUENCE {
     publicKeyAndChallenge    PublicKeyAndChallenge,
     signatureAlgorithm       AlgorithmIdentifier,
     signature                BIT STRING
   }
    PublicKey's encoded-format has to be X.509.

      • Fields inherited from class old.org.bouncycastle.asn1.ASN1Encodable
